author: redbeardlegoman
title: I'm Ready For My Merge Request, Mr. DeMille.
review:
While the extra pieces added to this camera make it interesting, and show that the camera need not be a single use part, this should have been just part of a larger polybag set.

Pros

  • It adds to the regular camera in a way that looks "Hollywood."
  • Comes with a reel-to-reel tile.

Cons

  • So few pieces, it would have been vastly improved if it were merged with one or more other polybags in this series.
  • This would have been better as a part of a larger accessories pack.

Even if it were simply merged with the Katinco and Megaphone (4069), this would have had better value.
